[Hashicorp Logo] <https://view.hashicorp.com/ODQ1LVpMRi0xOTEAAAGaK86qjNw1cS244Pni1Gsa5x2DDttotF6dtQQ9_ix0gCztXYdVpAqTJ8qJGz5P_evkhnH7fds=>

Secrets don’t stay secret for long when they’re hardcoded, copied, or forgotten.

HCP Vault Radar<https://view.hashicorp.com/ODQ1LVpMRi0xOTEAAAGaK86qjKHxaejmWq6LHj_1hYEUeMvVZaC6gDps18fY-9GP0cxjeWpbiRudF32FvU6ka2eb_gY=>, now generally available, is a powerful new way to detect, manage, and prevent leaked secrets across all environments.

With just a few clicks, platform, DevOps, and security teams can:

*   Detect leaks across code repos, CI/CD systems, tools like Confluence, and even on-prem
  *   Prioritize risks automatically using rich metadata and built-in remediation workflows
  *   Prevent future leaks by scanning pull requests and alerting developers before secrets hit production

Start securing your environments<https://view.hashicorp.com/ODQ1LVpMRi0xOTEAAAGaK86qjH4dqrXDor2PHfOyqffxmqEiUM-6mCT5vBsHOU8CrIKaiaGCwiGh9F3kpzF8_9BVbhc=> without re-architecting your stack — no prior HashiCorp setup required.
